description:
A classic hourglass, all of its sand having flowed into the bottom bulb. Indicates time has passed. Color varies across platforms.

Commonly used for various content concerning time. May also be used for hourglass-shaped figures. Not to be confused with ⏳ Hourglass Not Done, whose sand is still flowing.

Used on Snapchat to indicate a Snapstreak is soon to end.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the hourglass done emoji is depicted with a rich, sandy brown hue filling the bottom bulb, signifying completion, while the top bulb remains empty, the sand having fully passed through. The glass itself features Apple's characteristic soft rounded edges and subtle highlights, giving it a polished, tactile appearance. This emoji effectively communicates that time has elapsed, a task is finished, or a deadline has been met, offering a clear visual cue for the end of a process on Apple devices.
